Articles.Content: Here's a fracture in the surface Minmus. Stretches very far. Extremely dangerous.
Looks like a mild texturing problem, Minmus I have seen have more texture problems than other worlds. Are other places doing it or just Minmus? I wouldn't worry about it too much.

Looks like a mild texturing problem, Minmus I have seen have more texture problems than other worlds. Are other places doing it or just Minmus? I wouldn't worry about it too much.

You can find those things quite everywhere. There was a similar issue (or it's a feature?) with the biome map: a glitch in it could make appear the tundra biome near KSC.
There's also a couple spots in the R&D section where if you walk over them with a kerbal, you'll glitch into the ground and then explode.
